name: One Piece - Wanted Dashboard Theme
description: It is ideal to use this theme if you have a larger desktop screen - it looks better. Hopefully the background image would fit all screens. If not, feel free to message me on Tumblr and I'll resize it for you. Background Image credit goes to deskcar.com. Please make sure you see how the dashboard is going to look like (click here) before installing! Note: One Piece logo, new post window, notification window, and buttons do not come with theme. Have any questions regarding this theme? Reach me on my Tumblr at seikens.tumblr.com
